value:
Alfonse, Sharena... Before I faced the
trial of the rabbit, you did too. And
you overcame it.

Even if you are forced onto a
path that takes you far from
yourself...$k$pspring will find you and awaken
within your soul.

It may just be me...but I see a change
in my sister's eyes.

You have no plans to dress as a
rabbit? I feel the look would suit
you, $Nu.

A rabbit astride a horse...
It's a strange vision, yet one
apropos of the spring festival.

Is it $Nu?
Good. I bring spring tidings
from $Nf.

Treat me as you'd treat a
common hare, and you will
find yourself in trouble.

I shall enliven the spring
festival yet!

This is embarrassing, isn't
it... I must persevere.

A spring blessing? I thank
the festival for this boon.

I shall stop myself before I reveal
my name. Pay me no mind. I am
merely attending the spring festival.

Zacharias? I apologize, but that name
is unfamiliar to me.$k$pPerhaps the exuberance of spring has
pushed thoughts of the past from my
mind...$k$pAll that matters to me at this moment
is celebrating with my dear sister.$k$pThe spring festival is a balm—a
benediction for those who have
triumphed over winter's cruelty.$k$pYou would do well to bathe in the
warmth, too, $Nu.$k$pRevel in this moment. The season
only lasts so long...
はっ
春よ
うああっ！
衣装が！
Spring is here!
You are insufficiently festive!
I'll close out winter.
Endless spring!
These floppy ears...
Hmpht
Not hurt, are you?
Feel spring's warmth.
To think that even I would be attired like this...
You like these clothes on me? I can't say the same.
Should I compliment Veronica? Tell me—do you think she looks good as a rabbit?
It seems that Alfonse and Sharena also dressed as rabbits...
It is a blessing of the spring season to be here with you.
Just so.
Springtime...
So warm.
